title: Yellowing Rams Horn
content:
Yellowing Rams Horn is an item collected with the Gatherer profession.

Used with the B.R.E.W.S. Vat to create a reagent used in most early recipes in the Bonewright profession.

Stored in the Bones Bank, currently found in Cutters Clearing in Hopeforest or in Bone Vats in Mine of Mantuban.
